name: AzoulaSmart
0:
”Alexa, turn on the living room light.”
”Alexa, dim living room light by fifty percent.”
”Alexa, set living room light to red.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Connect to your Azoula account, and then you can control all of your smart lightings. Features: On/Off, brightness, color temperature, color.
